Text: Yeah, consider this my apology for cutting out on the dump quarter way through the first episode.  If people are interested, I've got a rather large collection of furry comics that I have gathered from various threads or other collections.  If a comic is hard to find online, send me a message (if possible) or comment and I will check my archives to see if I have it.  However, due to the fact that I do not know if I get notified from comments, I may not notice for a while.  Thanks again for reading, enjoy the comic.
I guess it's a coined term, then.  I consider a furry comic a comic that is sexual, mainly focusing on anthropomorphic creatures (AKA Furries).

furry is male on female animal. bestiality is male animal on female human.

Other combinations doubtless exist. Animal on animal is Discovery Channel, as we all know.
